mapper.sql: lessonType, memberId, orderId, parentId, purchaseTime, totalLessonNum, lessonLeftNum, teachingIds
mapper.select: SELECT P.parentId,S.memberId as studentId,S.`name` AS studentName FROM parents P INNER JOIN parent_stu_r PS ON p.parentId = PS.parentId INNER JOIN student S ON PS.memberId = S.memberId WHERE P.openId = #{openid}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(teachingDate,'%c.%e') AS teachingDate,TR.startTime,TR.endTime,A.teacherName,TR.teachingNum FROM teachingrecord TR INNER JOIN ( SELECT L.lessonTradeId,T.teacherName FROM lessontrade L INNER JOIN teacher T ON L.teacherId = T.teacherId WHERE L.parentId = #{parentId} AND L.memberId = #{memberId} )A ON TR.lessonTradeId = A.lessonTradeId WHERE STR_TO_DATE(teachingDate,'%Y-%m') = STR_TO_DATE(#{queryMonth},'%Y-%m')
